title: Bufo cryptotympanicus
text:
Bufo cryptotympanicus is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="toad">toad</a> in the family <a href="Bufonidae">Bufonidae</a>. Known commonly as the earless toad, it is found in southern China (<a href="Guangxi">Guangxi</a> and <a href="Guangdong">Guangdong</a> provinces) and northern Vietnam (on/near <a href="Fansipan">Mount Fansipan</a>). Its natural <a href="habitat">habitat</a>s are <a href="subtropical">subtropical</a> or <a href="tropical">tropical</a> moist lowland <a href="forest">forest</a>s, <a href="river">river</a>s, <a href="swamp">swamp</a>s, freshwater <a href="marsh">marsh</a>es, and intermittent freshwater marshes. It is threatened by <a href="habitat%20loss">habitat loss</a>.
The earless toad is about in length.
